snippet: In “Bringing Up Bébé,” Pamela Druckerman shares the wisdom of French child rearing that she gleaned from her own experiences as an American mother in Paris.
abstract: Susannah Meadows reviews book Bringing Up Bebe: One American Mother Discovers the Wisdom of French Parenting by Pamela Druckerman.
lead_paragraph: In “Bringing Up Bébé,” Pamela Druckerman shares the wisdom of French child rearing that she gleaned from her own experiences as an American mother in Paris.

headline.seo: ‘Bringing Up Bébé,’ a French-Influenced Guide by Pamela Druckerman
headline.main: Raising the Perfect Child, With Time for Smoke Breaks
headline.print_headline: Raising the Perfect Child, With Time for Smoke Breaks
